name: Lost Notes
description:
CONTENT WARNING
This game involves flashing lights and loud sounds and it deals with mature topics.

MEANT OT BE PLAYS WITH HEADPHONES AND SOUND ON!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move
Mouse to look around and aim flashlight.
LMB to turn flashlight on/off
SPACE to pause game
press O + P to force quit the game

HOW TO PLAY:

Collect notes to progress.
Your flashlight will change intensity when looking in the direction of the next note.
When flashlight is off you move and rotate flashlight faster.
Starting from the second note monsters will begin to appear. Listen to their growls to determine where are they coming from (left/right). Shine light on them to kill them.
After the 4th note ghosts will start to appear.= when you have your flashlight on. Turn flashlight off before they reach you.
